title: Plan Annual Warehouse Inventory Audit
description: An internal auditor needs to plan the annual audit of a key distribution warehouse.

tasks.description: Review the prior year's audit workpapers to understand previous findings and risks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor identifies recurring issues like inventory count discrepancies.

tasks.description: Draft an audit planning memo outlining the scope (including specific locations to be cycle counted), objectives, and required resources.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal planning memo is created.

tasks.description: Schedule a kick-off meeting with the warehouse management to discuss the audit timeline and logistics.
tasks.expected_outcome: A meeting is scheduled and confirmed with the auditee.
